name: Research Frontiers Inc.
description: Research Frontiers Inc. is a technology company that develops and licenses a unique technology known as SPD (Suspended Particle Device) technology, which allows for the control of light and heat in various applications. Founded in 1965, the company has established itself as a leader in the smart glass and dynamic glazing industries. SPD technology offers a versatile solution for managing solar heat and glare, making it ideal for use in automotive, architectural, and aerospace applications. The company’s flagship product, SPD-SmartGlass, is used in a variety of settings including luxury vehicles, commercial buildings, and private residences. This innovative glass can switch from a clear state to an opaque state within seconds, providing privacy and reducing energy consumption. Research Frontiers collaborates with various manufacturers and partners to integrate their technology into products that enhance user comfort and environmental efficiency. With a commitment to sustainability and energy efficiency, Research Frontiers Inc. continues to push the boundaries of smart glass technology, aiming to improve quality of life while addressing global energy challenges.
